theme_subtitle: Choose best theme for you! Light or dark?
info_subtitle: Do you want to know more about the app?
interval_description: You can filter the amount and price values with the help of interval section.
buyers_sellers_description: You can benefit from the values in the buyers and sellers sections while you are deciding for the next trade.
last_trade_description: You can also look at the last trade value and spread value before your decisions.
language_description: You can change the language of the app according to your native language. We only have Türkçe and English options for now but more will be added!
theme_description: You can change the theme of the app according to your preferences. People are divided into two groups: those love the dark mode and whose who don't.
social_info_subtitle: You can contact with me via social media channels.
